ygData.subject: Diana!

From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>

(This is my reply with Rion, I'm pressed for time, so I'll reply with Tav 
later, tomorrow afternoon at the latest.)

Rion turned to face Firestorm. He had no idea who this new 'bot was, but at 
least his affiliation was Maximal. He didn't know who the other 'bot was 
either, but he seemed friendly enough:

"Can you tell who it... is..."

Rion strained his ears. He thought he heard something... He could have sworn 
someone had yelled his name. He quickly scanned the area, and discovered a 
'bot not too far from him, only 200 meters, just beyond the far sand dune. 
It was the familiar signature he had recognized earlier:

"I think I hear someone!"

Rion motioned for the two 'bots to follow as he ran across the hot sand. His 
feet were burning and his feathers had singe marks on them from where he had 
had prolonged exposure to his overheated pod. Rion's wings slowly began to 
make flapping motions as he picked up speed. It was a second nature of his 
beastmode, one he was rather grateful for. Each wing beat brought new relief 
from the heat, but only for a moment:

"DIANA!"

Rion knew it was her. It had to be. He wasn't leaving this desert until he 
found her!
